Items.Title: Calling upon all New York City departments and agencies to come into compliance with the terms and conditions of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.
Items.MatterName: Americans with Disabilities Act, City Compliance

Items.Title: Calling upon all New York City departments and agencies to come into compliance with the terms and conditions of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990.
Items.MatterName: Americans with Disabilities Act, City Compliance

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass A.2914, a bill that would strengthen the requirements for child abuse background checks of employees of agencies and other institutions having substantial contact with children, expand the types of agencies and other institutions required to make such background checks, and allow the State to share child abuse information with other states.
Items.MatterName: Child abuse background checks of employees

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the Council of the City of New York to study the issue of discrimination against left-handed people in order to determine if left-handed people can be included as a protected class in anti-discrimination statues.

Resolution calling upon the appropriate committee of the Council of the City of New York to study the issue of discrimination against left-handed people in order to determine if left-handed people can be included as a protected class in anti-discrimination statues.

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass A.2914, a bill that would strengthen the requirements for child abuse background checks of employees of agencies and other institutions having substantial contact with children, expand the types of agencies and other institutions required to make such background checks, and allow the State to share child abuse information with other states.
Items.MatterName: Child abuse background checks of employees

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Harrison, Povman & Stabile
